attributes.action: Increase vape tank size and refill size limits in TPD or remove them completely
attributes.additional_details: I switched to vaping with a few friends after smoking 60 a day for over 40 years. The tank being so small means not only do you need to fill it more often but you also need to carry refill bottles with you when you go out. The bottle size limit is just as frustrating as if you are a heavy user, for example me switching to vaping after smoking so much i need a few refill bottles and dread running out when the shops are closed. My friends are all back on cigs, could not be bothered with the hassle
attributes.background: The vape tank size limit should be increased or removed from the TPD, the same applies to the eliquid refill bottle sizes. They achieve nothing but the frustration of people who are trying to switch from smoking, push up costs for consumers and increase the amout of packaging ending up as waste.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure if you'd like the volume limits to be changed (and what they should be changed to) or to be removed altogether. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
